resources.string: The laws of physics tell us that energy is:
Which of the following is not a form of energy?
Whatâ€™s the difference between weight and mass?

array.name: Physics_Q3_Answers
array.item: Mass is the amount of matter in an object, weight is the gravitational force on an object
Mass is metric, weight is imperial
Mass is a measure of size, weight is a measure of density

resources.string: Mass is the amount of matter in an object, weight is the gravitational force on an object
